input.sentences: i went to go visit a great historical building .
the leading to the building was beautiful with a well .
here i was examining the walls .
there was even a pretty garden blooming .
and there was also a tombstone for someone who passed away here .
output.sentences: We spent the day exploring the city and admiring the historical buildings.
There were many beautiful flowers and statues to take in.
If you looked closely, you could see engraving on the stone walls.
All of the gardens surrounding us were in bloom.
Looking at all the old tombstones was interesting.
